last_episode_to_air.name: Birth of a Tragedy
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lucy confronts the reality of her situation and is forced to make an impossible choice. Boyd is tested to her limits in her pursuit of the truth, and Dhillon comes to a realisation, with catastrophic results.

name: The Devil's Hour
overview: Lucy wakes every night at exactly 3:33am. Nothing in her life has made sense for a long time. But the answers are out there, somewhere, at the end of a trail of brutal murders.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Lucy wakes every night at exactly 3:33am. Nothing in her life has made sense for a long time. But the answers are out there, somewhere, at the end of a trail of brutal murders.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: This is a story of two Lucys – a police detective who failed to stop a tragedy, and a mother who may have to sacrifice everything in order to fulfil promises made in a previous life. Their realities collide in a mission to stop the worst thing imaginable. But who can you trust when your memories are no longer your own?

episodes.overview: Lucy wakes every night at exactly 3:33am. Nothing in her life has made sense for a long time. But the answers are out there, somewhere, at the end of a trail of brutal murders.

episodes.name: The Velveteen Rabbit
episodes.overview: Lucy investigates a strange connection between her son’s fantasies and her new neighbours, unaware that she is being targeted by a dangerous criminal.

episodes.name: Tchaikovsky
episodes.overview: Lucy finds herself at the heart of a police investigation. Her waking nightmares reveal impossible information, leading her and DI Dhillon to make a grim discovery.

episodes.name: After the Storm
episodes.overview: Lucy exploits her connection with Dhillon to track down an elusive teenager, worried he is being targeted by their prime suspect.

episodes.name: The Half of Ourselves We Have Lost
episodes.overview: Following a tragic twist of fate, Dhillon teams up with Lucy to track down the mysterious stranger at the centre of the chaos.

episodes.name: Amor Fati
episodes.overview: With the suspect in custody, the answers to life’s mysteries are within Lucy’s reach. But will she believe them?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Lucy wakes every night at exactly 3:33am. Nothing in her life has made sense for a long time. But the answers are out there, somewhere, at the end of a trail of brutal murders.

episodes.name: DI Chambers
episodes.overview: DI Chambers and her partner DS Dhillon investigate an elusive serial killer named Gideon Shepherd.

episodes.name: Red Lines
episodes.overview: Lucy and Isaac start a new chapter – but their short-lived peace is thwarted by the revival of a police investigation that threatens to expose her double-life.

episodes.name: Something Beginning with D
episodes.overview: Lucy and Gideon identify a suspect in their efforts to prevent an atrocity. Lucy risks everything to confirm her suspicion, culminating in a decision she will never be able to come back from.

episodes.name: Far Away
episodes.overview: Lucy desperately tries to cover her tracks as secrets and lies are forced into the open and a terrible deadline looms.

episodes.name: Birth of a Tragedy
episodes.overview: Lucy confronts the reality of her situation and is forced to make an impossible choice. Boyd is tested to her limits in her pursuit of the truth, and Dhillon comes to a realisation, with catastrophic results.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: This is a story of two Lucys – a police detective who failed to stop a tragedy, and a mother who may have to sacrifice everything in order to fulfil promises made in a previous life. Their realities collide in a mission to stop the worst thing imaginable. But who can you trust when your memories are no longer your own?
